channel.title: Event 2 :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: EVENT REPORT: AWS Cloud Mastery Series #1 — AI/ML/GenAI on AWS Date: Saturday, November 15, 2025 Time: 8:00 AM – 11:30 AM Location: AWS Vietnam Office, Bitexco Financial Tower, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City Objective: Provide foundational to advanced understanding of AI/ML services and Generative AI (GenAI) on AWS. 1. Opening & Context (8:00 – 8:30 AM) Registration and networking to kick off the event. Session introduced learning objectives and workshop structure. Overview of AI/ML landscape in Vietnam — trends, opportunities, and challenges. 2. AWS AI/ML Platform Overview (8:30 – 10:00 AM) The morning session focused on Amazon SageMaker, AWS’s fully managed end-to-end machine learning platform.
